Description:
Develop a Designer Dream in the McKinnon zone!
If you could pick a dream location...this is it! The existing spacious 4 bedroom, 2 bathroom home with in-ground pool offers substantial scope to renovate and update or utilise the plans prepared by renowned Brighton designer Shane LaPeyre and build two massive up-market 35 square (approx) side by side double storey townhouses with 4 bedrooms plus media room! With permits in place, the dream awaits to enjoy the benefits and options available on 730sqm (approx) of blue-chip real estate walking distance to Joyce Park, Ormond train station & shopping strip & in-zone McKinnon Primary School & Secondary College!
Update or develop...plans & permits provided
McKinnon Secondary College zone
Close to schools, parks, shops & station

Description:
All offers considered. Inspect now!
The original landholding home of Ormond Hill, "The Gables" c.1890 showcases 4 bedrooms plus a library-sized home-office, formal living/dining (with hand-painted detail & one of three marble fireplaces) & a sun-filled north-facing family zone around a bay-windowed American Cherry & La Germania kitchen. With two beautiful period-style bathrooms (one a dual ensuite with claw-foot bath), modern comforts (including ducted heating, reverse-cycle air-con & alarm), & historical features (including cellar), this historic beauty even catches a distant You Yangs view ...with the opportunity to replace an original tower (subject to Council Approval) & find the bay view that gives this street its name. Land 730sqm approx.
4 bedrooms, 2 bathrooms, study, cellar
formal & family living/dining, LaGermania kitchen
air-con, heating, alarm, 4 f'places (3 marble)
return veranda, northerly rear, McKinnon Coll Zone
If you are interested in this property, you may require a market appraisal of your own home. If so please contact Chris Hassall on 0412 898 990.

Description:
Vendor says sell
Providing an outstanding location this delightful and well presented one bedroom apartment will make a very sound investment opportunity or the perfect first home.
Only minutes to Ormond shops, cafes and station the property itself affords open living room and kitchen, master bedroom with BIR, ensuite bathroom and rear court yard with deck.
Drenched in natural light other features include polished timber floors, split system heating and cooling, security intercom system and off street under cover parking.
Vacant possession is provided with an expected rental return of $250-$270 per week.

Description:
Selling Now! Affordable Opportunity
This absolutely beautiful 3 bedroom, 2 bathroom single level townhouse has the flair for entertaining. Sparkling with polished floor boards, open plan entertaining area opening onto a lovely courtyard, stunning kitchen with stone bench tops and stainless steel appliances, large main bathroom, good sized laundry, ducted heating and vacuum coupled with ducted add-on cooling air-conditioning, double auto garage with internal access.
This quality built home further boats a master which features a modern en-suite and walk in robe, whilst the other two bedrooms include built in robes.
All this close to Ormond train station, North Road and Centre Road shops & cafes and is located just minutes from one of Victoria's most prestige and well-known schools, McKinnon Secondary College.

Description:
Zone in on a designer Deco
This is period-perfect family living in the perfect family location. Zoned for both McKinnon College & Primary School at the cul-de-sac end of this leafy street, this 3 bedroom plus study area, 2 bathroom Art Deco beauty showcases a designer renovation with a gracious lounge, formal dining (perfect as home-office) & family living stretching out through north-facing bi-folds to undercover entertaining. Starring a CaesarStone & Miele kitchen, there's all the practicalities (ducted heating, reverse-cycle air-con, alarm & carport) plus fabulously family-wise luxuries including a Travertine-tiled 2-way ensuite, spa-bathroom, surround-sound wiring ...even a state-of-the-art 2-level cubby for the kids! Land 665sqm approx.
3 bedrooms with robes, built-in study, 2 bathrooms,(spa)
lounge, dining/home-office, north-facing family zone
duct heating, r/c air-con, alarm, carport, al fresco
"almost cul-de-sac" in McKinnon College & PS Zones
If you are interested in this property, you may require a market appraisal of your own home. If so please contact Chris Hassall on 0412 898 990.

Description:
Single-Level, Sun-Filled & Stress-Free
Fresh, bright & relaxed, this single-level home has all the makings of hassle-free living in an efficient design. Behind a big & private front courtyard discover a large air-conditioned living room & adjoining dining room with a north-facing orientation, modern kitchen & floorboards combined with neutral tones to look great against your furniture. Note: Zoned for McKinnon Secondary College.
Comprising: Entry, north-facing living room (air conditioner), north-facing dining room, modern kitchen (oven, four-burner cooktop, double sink, stainless-steel dishwasher, pull-out rangehood, microwave recess), large main bedroom (sliding mirrored BIRs), second bedroom (BIRs), bathroom (bath, separate shower, vanity, basin), separate toilet, laundry (cupboards, trough, access to a rear courtyard), big north-facing front courtyard, single garage.
Features: Central heating, floorboards, linen cupboard, front door security screen, side awnings, driveway gates, off-street parking for one car, own street frontage, one of three on the block, zoned for McKinnon Secondary College.
Private Sale: $550,000
Glenn Bricker 0419 359 047
Debbie Kiffer 0425 786 412

Description:
Plans and Permits For 6 Apartments and 1 Shop In Ormond!
Builders, developers and investors have a look at this! All the hard work has already been done! Original condition shop with 260sqm approx. of land offering plans and permits to construct 6 apartments and a shop rising vertically in the heart of Ormond. Within walking distance to Ormond Train Station, public and private schools, local restaurants and cafs, bustling shopping precincts, this superb opportunity is perfect for the developer and builder looking to maximize their portfolio!
437 North Road Ormond comprises of 6 spacious 2 bedroom apartments featuring built-in-robes, stylish open-plan living, modern kitchen with stainless steel appliances, chrome tap ware, stainless steel under-mount sinks, central bathroom with framed glass shower screens, chrome taps & mixers, turntable car-parking, automatic gates and much more.
Plans and permits approved, working drawings completed!
Plans and details to view in office available.
Land size: 7.05m x 36.85 = 260sqm approx.

Description:
Space to Relax...Inside and Out!
Invite the family for lunch! This quality two bedroom ground floor apartment is ideally located close to shops, parks and station for easy access, offers a kitchen large enough to cater for more than one chef using the new stainless-steel appliances, and a spacious lounge leading out to the wrap-around courtyard graced by a timber deck large enough to fit the family-sized table! With new carpets to both bedrooms, reverse-cycle heating/cooling, security intercom entry and a car space on title, this property gives you convenient fashionable living with an outdoor space to entertain the masses in style!
2 bedrooms, kitchen with s/s appliances

Description:
Renovators Delight!
Opportunities to secure real estate in a prime position and to renovate to your own taste are rare indeed! With 'location, location, location' covered, this centrally located villa is within the blue chip McKinnon Secondary College zone, close to transport, parks & station and nestled in a quiet and tightly held block. Why pay for someone else's update when you can reap the rewards yourself? Polish, paint & update the existing two bedrooms, bathroom, kitchen with meals area and single lock up garage. Top it off with landscaping in the rear sun drenched courtyard and this little beauty will realise its full investment potential!
- McKinnon Secondary College zone
- Close to parks, station & shops
- Renovate, redecorate, update

Description:
Solid, Secure & Stylish in the Zone!
Why buy an apartment when you can own your own villa? Providing a great first home or ideal investment within the McKinnon Secondary College zone, this brick dwelling offers two bedrooms, living with gas space heater and air-conditioner, kitchen with meals area and polished timber boards throughout. With the security of direct entry from the single lock up garage, the convenience of large outdoor spaces to entertain, the privacy of a rear courtyard, and the bonus of street presence, this villa provides opportunities to keep an ongoing tenant, or to modernise and update to maximise future returns. Within walking distance to schools, parks, shops and train stations, this is location, location, location!
McKinnon Secondary College zone
2 bedrooms, rear courtyard
Heating, air-conditioner, polished boards
Walk to shops, parks, schools & station

Description:

This bright refurbished ground floor apartment features an open plan kitchen, living, dining that leads out to the sunny courtyard. Also comprising parquetry floors, Blanco stainless steel appliances, heating and cooling, 2 spacious bedrooms with built in wardrobes, central bathroom with bath and laundry facilities plus separate toilet. Under cover parking for 1 vehicle. Easy stroll to Ormond station and North Road shops.

Description:
Period perfect ...parkside!
Enjoy an outstanding Ormond outlook from this covetable Californian. Facing the Rosstown Trail parklands, this classic Californian Bungalow offers more than just beautiful detail - there's great accommodation too with 4 bedrooms, a study & 2.5 bathrooms within its leadlit, panelled & parquetry floored surrounds! Timelessly styled with a stainless-steel appliance & timber kitchen & a period-style ensuite & WIR for the garden-access master, this heated, cooled & alarmed home stars gracious lounge & dining, spacious family living & great garaging with four spaces including two garages...there's even a spot to float away with a spa summer-house in paved entertainer's gardens.
4 bedrooms, study, 2.5 bathrooms, (ensuite) WIR
Lounge, dining, OFP, family zone, st-st app kitchen
Heating, cooling, alarm, 2 garages, spa-summer-house
Opposite park, walk to school, shops & station
If you are interested in this property, you may require a market appraisal of your own home. If so please contact Heather Steadman on 0402 008 077.

Description:
Excelent in Size, Location & Comfort
Low maintenance luxury sets the benchmark for this elegant 4 bedroom 2 bathroom 3 toilets street frontage residence. High ceilings, polished floor boards, 2 generous rumpus & livings areas, stunning kitchen with stone bench tops and stainless steel appliances, meals area, well sized master bedroom downstairs with WIRs & a superb modern en-suite and a further 3 bedrooms with build in robes.
Also features a beautifully maintained private courtyard, central ducted heating with add-on cooling air-conditioning, central ducted vacuum, great storage & internal access to a double auto garage.
Located in the well-known McKinnon Secondary College School Zone and only a short walk to the local train, cafes & schools.

Description:
14 Apartments, one title, one huge opportunity!
Held by the original developer & offered for the first time in over forty years, "Ormond Court" is a rare offering of a complete group of 14 single-bedroom apartments with a blue-chip Ormond address & a high-amenity location. Blocks from the shopping strip, station & bus-route in a leafy locale of fine homes & quality apartments, this well-maintained group offers an opportunity to purchase at wholesale price, upgrade & strata-title for a value-added short-term return. Alternatively, add this fully-tenanted group to your superannuation portfolio & benefit from low-vacancy rates & high rental returns (around $140,000pa) in a location destined for future capital growth.
whole block of 14 x1 bedroom apartments
returning approx $140,000pa, growth potential
all presented in neat condition with carports
amenity location near shops, train & bus

Description:
Californian Potential big land prized Zone Address!
Original potential with a Zone position doesn't get more original or better positioned than this! A Time Capsule of beautiful Californian Bungalow detail, this original condition weatherboard home offers an exciting opportunity for an enthusiastic renovator. Rip up the carpets, polish the leadlight & embellish elaborately decorated ceilings, then extend beyond this 3 bedroom floorplan to create the gracious family living. Alternatively, create something completely new on this approx 7500sqft/700sqm site with a prestige new home (or homes - subject to Council Approval). Whatever the plan, this prime position in the McKinnon College Zone on the edge of the Ormond shopping strip is history in the making!

original 3 bedroom weatherboard Californian Bungalow
sunny north-westerly rear orientation
edge of the Ormond shopping & transport strip

Streetfront sensation in a central spot
Step up to the streetfront for space, sun and super street-presence! Stretching out along Walsh St with an auto-garage & carspace, this 2 bedroom, 2.5 bathroom, 2-storey home puts the focus on an entertaining lifestyle with a large sunny lounge reaching out to the north with a bay-window & a relaxed tiled casual zone stepping out to a private courtyard. Cleverly designed with a bathroom for each robe-fitted bedroom (one an ensuite), this centrally heated home features a Blanco kitchen with step-in pantry, a huge powder-room... & a superbly central position & lavishly leafy location just two blocks to the train & one block to the Ormond shopping strip.
2 double bedrooms with robes, 2.5 bathrooms
north-facing lounge, casual zone, Blanco kitchen
duct heating, auto-garage, carspace, courtyard
fronting Walsh St, walk to station, bus & shops

Description:
Ideal Corner block in the zone!
Positioned in the McKinnon School Zone on a prized corner allotment of approximately 700sqm, this delightful timber residence built in 1955 retaining some fine original features provides numerous options (STCA) including a new home site re-development, dual occupancy or renovation (All STCA) whilst enjoying this coveted Ormond address. Comprises: Entry hall, generous living and dining rooms, 3 bedrooms, sunroom, large central kitchen, bathroom, plus an outdoor study or studio/bungalow. Features: Gas ducted heating, stained timber joinery and decorative ceiling. Land 15.24m x 46.02m (50'x151') approximately.

Description:
Zone quality benchmark!
The primary school is at one end of the street, the back-gate to the College is at the other & the most exacting quality in the Zone is here! This just-completed streetfront home sets the standard with a flexible design featuring a balconied master-suite, playroom/study/4th bedroom beside a ground-floor 3rd bathroom, a gasfire-warmed formal area & an expansive casual zone beneath 3m ceilings. With CaesarStone benchtops, Miele appliances, Spotted Gum Floors, fully-tiled bathrooms (including dual vanity ensuite) & amazing storage (including a deluxe dressing-room), there's every conceivable appointment including auto-garaging behind auto-gates. All new...this one sets a new standard in the Zone.
up to 4 bedrm, 3 bathrm, 2 pwdr-rm, dual zones
auto-garage/gates, Stone & Miele kitchen, butler pantry
duct heating/air-con, vid-intercom, vac, alarm
between McKinnon Primary & McKinnon College
If you are interested in this property, you may require a market appraisal of your own home. If so please contact Chris Hassall on 0412 898 990.

Description:
Live in luxury, Play in the park
With a bedroom for everyone & living spaces for all, this 4 bedroom, 2.5 bathroom, multi-zoned home puts the focus on an entertaining lifestyle. Corner-sited in compact grounds overlooking Gunn Reserve this spacious house is finished to the highest quality with jarrah floors, granite benchtops & deluxe appointments (heating, cooling, vacuum, alarm, intercom, double auto-garage). Dual living/dining areas flow around an elite Euro appliance kitchen & out to paved gardens, while the 1st-floor includes a sublime master with WIR & dual vanity ensuite. two double size bedrooms & huge 4th bedroom with 2nd WIR - large enough to be another living space...just a walk to the station, a moment to the shops!
4 bedrooms with robes, 2.5 bathrooms, 2 WIRs
dual living/dining, Smeg kitchen, double garage
heating, cooling, vacuum, alarm, intercom
views across EE Gunn Res, walk to station
